Reference version 0.2.8

Package

snapprep

snapprep: R functions for data prep and curation from raw SNAP data.

Default options

snapdef

A function that returns a list of SNAP defaults such as path names to data sets and lists of available climate variables and models, etc.

AR5 downscaled climate

clim_inputs_table

Prepare inputs table for climate data extraction

clim_dist_monthly

Extract climate data and compute distributions

clim_dist_seasonal

Compute seasonal climate data spatial distributions

split_monthly_files

Split grouped monthly files into individual files

clim_stats_ar5

Compute climate statistics

clim_locs

Arrange climate by location and compute seasonals.

clim_locs_dec_all

Consolidate decadal climate values for all point locations.

clim_locs_prep

Extract climate values for point locations

Subregion grid cell tables

snap_poly_list

Generate nested list of spatial polygons data frames

save_poly_cells

Save rds files containing raster cell tables for polygons

Amazon Web Services

aws_upload

Upload data to Amazon Web Services
